testsuite.name: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage with outcome URL

testcase.name: Given I set up the LTI consumer key and shared secret if not already done
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage with outcome URL

testcase.name: When I launch random "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Administrator" and outcome URL "default" and document target "window"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage with outcome URL

testcase.name: Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage with outcome URL

testcase.name: When I click the 'System Homepage' mapping button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage with outcome URL

testcase.name: And I accept the LTI Mapping Page confirm dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage with outcome URL

testcase.name: Then I am on the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage with outcome URL

testcase.name: And I close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage with outcome URL

testcase.name: When I re-launch "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Administrator" and outcome URL "default" and document target "window"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage with outcome URL

testcase.name: Then I am on the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage with outcome URL

testcase.name: And I close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create link to System Homepage with outcome URL
